query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: VesselAI Extreme-scale data processing, management services and semantics - v2.00
result.description: These series of deliverables will report the scientific foundations, the design, requirements and final services of the VesselAI project on the involved data services technologies as studied and researched within tasks T2.1-T2.5 including the Data Ingestion and Management Module, the Semantic Enrichment Module, the Triplestore and Reasoning Engine and the Distributed Query Execution Engine

result.title: Final Dissemination, Communication and Stakeholder Engagement Report
result.description: This deliverable aims to provide the final report on all dissemination, communication and stakeholder engagement activities performed during the last reporting period of the project; In addition, this deliverable will provide a detailed report about which data have been collected and generated during the project and describe how it will be shared and opened after the project’s completion.

result.title: VesselAI's Platform & Services - Release 3.00
result.description: These series of deliverables will consist of a software package that will include the VesselAI platform and its APIs with corresponding supporting documentation on the deployment of each component and usage of the APIs. Each of these deliverables will provide enhanced versions of the platform based both on the pilots’ feedback and the envisioned incremental improvements on top of the initial VesselAI prototype, designed to deliver a final high-quality end offering. D5.6 will also incorporate update on the VesselAI Platform and Services.

result.title: VesselAI Pilots Documentation, Evaluation and Impact Assessment v1.00
result.description: These deliverables will document the pilots’ operation and execution consolidating the input of Tasks 6.2-5 and also evaluate the respective version of the platform, from Release 1.00 (first, functional version of the platform, after the mock-ups/ prototype) until Release 4.00 of the platform. It will also present lessons learnt during the project, constituting methodological adoption guidelines for the utilisation of the VesselAI platform.

result.title: VesselAI's Platform & Services - Release 4.00
result.description: These series of deliverables will consist of a software package that will include the VesselAI platform and its APIs with corresponding supporting documentation on the deployment of each component and usage of the APIs. Each of these deliverables will provide enhanced versions of the platform based both on the pilots’ feedback and the envisioned incremental improvements on top of the initial VesselAI prototype, designed to deliver a final high-quality end offering. D5.6 will also incorporate update on the VesselAI Platform and Services.

result.title: Platform Architecture and VesselAI's Platform & Services - Release 1.00
result.description: This deliverable will consist of a functional prototype version of the VesselAI platform, which will provide almost all envisioned interactions with the end users (leaving certain backend processes in a mock-up state) so as to ensure that users will be in a position to provide timely and efficient feedback to be leveraged for the next platform releases. The functionalities to be included in the prototype will be also based on the MVP defined in WP1. The deliverable will also include all necessary updates on the VesselAI platform and components’ architecture, as well as the APIs interfaces, based on feedback received by the project’s pilots.

category.title: Music and musicology, history of music

result.title: Data Ingestion, Analysis and Annotation, Second Version
result.description: D1.2: Data Ingestion, Analysis and Annotation, Second Version (CERTH: M20). Describes initial set of data ingestion services delivered to TVP, covering partner CMS/MAMS, social media, Web logs, video/TV viewing logs. Includes further developments and evaluation of improvements for video abstractions. Presents the updated and extended versions of concept-based video abstractions. Specifically, MTL and structured outputs will be introduced in our deep learning architectures targeting more accurate concept detection, improved fine-tuning algorithms will be developed that consider the commonalities between the source and target domain, the developed algorithms will be scaled to a bigger pool of target concepts. Includes further developments and evaluation of improvements for brand detection. Specifically, we will extend the brand detection algorithms with inductive transfer in our CNN architectures, more brand labels and advanced fusion methods for the final video-level brand detection.

project.title: Enhancing and Re-Purposing TV Content for Trans-Vector Engagement

result.title: Data Analysis and Annotation, Final Version
result.description: D1.3: Data Analysis and Annotation, Final Version (CERTH: M30). Presents the final set of ReTV data analysis and annotation techniques. The final version of concept-based video abstraction and brand detection technologies. Updates to support final model and vocabulary aligned to WPs 2 and 3, support all media vectors, and Knowledge Graph optimizations at data scale based on queries/views needed by modelling and analytics processes (WP3).

result.title: Metadata and Viewer Profiling
result.description: D3.1 Metadata and Viewer Profiling (VUA: M10). This document presents a first version of a metadata model & vocabulary based on aggregation of required properties and value spaces across all data produced in ReTV, mappings to this shared model and a viewer profile model expressed according to this model.
